title: Peter Attia's Encounter with Theranos
content: In 2006, Peter was offered the Chief Medical Officer position at Theranos but declined due to several reasons. Eight years later, Forbes valued Theranos at $9 billion. In 2015, Peter saw Elizabeth Holmes at a fundraising event, and two days later, John Carreyrou exposed some of the fraud going on at Theranos. Peter believes that Elizabeth never thought she was doing anything wrong.

title: The trend of lower testosterone and higher estrogen in men: Why is it happening and what to do about it?
content: If you took blood samples from a group of men in the 1950s, and did the same for a similar group of men today… You would notice that, in today’s men, testosterone is lower, and their estrogen is higher. The reasons for this are an increase in obesity and chemicals that can mimic the effects of estrogen. Peter suggests using glass containers at home and washing all plastics by hand instead of in the dishwasher. However, he admits that he doesn't know how much of a difference this makes.

title: Takeaways from Peter’s recent hunting trip in Hawaii
content: Peter recently went to Hawaii to hunt axis deer. He gained an enormous appreciation for the expertise that goes into being able to actually get in a position to even take this shot. The deer are difficult to spot and stalk, and their sense of sight, hearing, and smell are preternatural. If you manage to find them, stalk them, get in position to shoot them, and accurately hit them, you then have to harvest them properly. The deer are not natural to Hawaii and are an invasive species. These are animals that are dying instantly because of how swiftly the kill happens (and from a great distance away).

title: Aleve for SIRS
content: The Aleve is for SIRS (Systemic Inflammatory Response Syndrome) which is why you feel bad with a cold. SIRS is the body’s immune response to the toxins that are being released by the virus, and more importantly, the immune cells themselves actually gearing up each other.

title: NAD precursors and Metformin
content: Peter is more bullish on NAD precursors such as nicotinamide riboside (NR) and NMN today versus a year ago. He remains incredibly optimistic about the use of metformin in people who are metabolically anything other than very healthy. But when you take that tiny subset of people who are like 9 out of 10 in terms of health… “it’s possible metformin is not helping them, and it’s even possible that metformin is detracting a little bit.”

title: Fat Burning Zones
content: The respiratory quotient (RQ) is used to measure the relative amount of fat oxidation versus glucose oxidation. When that ratio is in the 0.7 range, virtually all of your energy is coming from fat. When the ratio reaches 1.0, what that means is your VCO2 is equal to your VO2 (your production of carbon dioxide is equal to your consumption of oxygen). It tells you your RELATIVE amount of fat versus glucose.

title: Fasting and Exercise
content: That person is never going to get well without fasting and exercise. You just have to be able to drive glycogen depletion.

title: Absolute Fat Combustion
content: To understand absolute fat combustion, you must know the absolute level of VO2, and the absolute level of VCO2. During a test, the computer can spit out your VO2 and VCO2 every 15 seconds onto a spreadsheet. We then use that to determine total energy expenditure. Then you look at the ratio of VO2 to VCO2 to determine how much of my energy came from fat oxidation versus glucose oxidation.

title: Heart Rate Zones
content: At 60% of your maximum heart rate, you may be burning your highest percentage of fat, but you are absolutely not even coming close to burning your highest amount of fat. Exercising at 60% of maximum heart rate is too low in intensity. Zone 2 is a better place to be. Zones are based on heart rate and divided into five zones. Zone 2 is 75 to 80% of maximum heart rate. Your goal while doing cardio is to find that zone 2 either using a HR monitor or the “conversation” test.

title: Creatine Supplementation
content: Creatine is this molecule in our body that is a phosphate donor. ATP is a phosphate donor. ATP has three phosphates. Anytime you need energy, you’re basically turning ATP into ADP…it’s the liberation of the third P that is the energy that we use to do things. We actually have three energy systems (not two).

title: Anaerobic Energy System
content: Anaerobic when we can make ATP, once we’ve exceeded the level of sufficient cellular oxygen using pyruvate and turning it into lactate

title: Creatine Phosphate System
content: The third energy system called the creatine phosphate system. We use creatine as a direct donor of phosphate. In an all out energy burst, this is the energy system we are using for the first 3-4 seconds

title: History of Creatine Supplementation
content: About 30 years ago, it became really popular for athletes to supplementing with creatine phosphate. At the beginning, it was common to “load” so 20 g per day for 5 days, then do a maintenance phase at 5 g per day (or something close to that). You would gain a ton of weight. You definitely got stronger. It was a legitimate performance enhancing supplement. Today, we have learned… Creatine phosphate provides no benefit… you can just use the creatine monohydrate and you’ll pick up the phosphates in your body. The loading phase is unnecessary

title: Recommended Way to Take Creatine
content: Take 5 g per day of creatine monohydrate. Peter’s preferred brand: Biosteel Creatine Monohydrate

title: What to Expect When Taking Creatine
content: Gain some weight (mostly water weight). Some increase in strength

title: Who Would It Help?
content: Sprinters? ⇒ maybe. Competitive cyclist? ⇒ probably not, because by the time you are “sprinting” you are at the end stages of the race and you’ve already used up that creatine. Athletes looking for strength and performance gains? ⇒ probably. Average Joe looking to better results in the gym? ⇒ A coin toss. Chris Masterjohn says creatine might even help marathon runners

title: Is It Safe?
content: If you’re using a pure product (like Biosteel), it is incredibly safe
